reviews.review: The game is alright, albeit a bit dated now, but there's so much toxicity that it makes it hard to recommend.
bad game, a lot of cheaters

the best, the myst 
THE COLDZERA
VERY GOOD BUT TOO MANY CHEATERS
Nē nu ja nebūtu krievi, tā tīri normāla spēle

I love the game, but I HATE the fact they turned into free game. I bought it back in the days when you had to buy it if you want to play and it was cool. Spending 15-20 euros/pounds won't break the bank, but surely was keeping the toxic people and cheaters away. Period. I'm sick of facing trolls, toxic communications, and facing cheaters in pretty much every comp game man... My trust factor is high and I have overwatch rights. 9.5/10 games the suspect is cheating.
Ликовилепно, горит жеппа, турки лучшие тиммейты.
